snippet: Maher Nasser, a United Nations official, writes that the MUN conferences do not mirror the way the United Nations actually works.
lead_paragraph: Maher Nasser, a United Nations official, writes that the MUN conferences do not mirror the way the United Nations actually works.

headline.main: The U.N., on the Model U.N.
